entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. It’s a VeloBand Pulse, and I’m not happy with it.
I understand. I can certainly assist you with a return. Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
It’s [customer provides order number]. And hurry it up, I don't have all day.
Thank you. Let me pull up your order. Okay, I see your order for the VeloBand Pulse. Can you tell me why you’d like to return it?
It just doesn't work like they said it would! The heart rate monitoring is all over the place. I use it for my workouts, and it’s giving me completely wrong readings. I want my money back!

I apologize that the VeloBand Pulse isn't meeting your expectations. I understand your frustration. According to our return policy, you have 90 days to return any of our products for a full refund. Let me go ahead and process that for you now.
90 days? I thought it was shorter than that. I've had it for maybe two weeks… fifteen days max, so that's within the return window, right?

Yes, absolutely. You are well within the timeframe. While some accessories may have a shorter window, the VeloBand Pulse falls under our standard 90-day return policy. I can process a full refund for you right now. You'll receive a prepaid shipping label via email within the next hour. Just pack up the VeloBand Pulse in its original packaging if you still have it, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized carrier location. Once we receive the return, the refund will be credited back to your original payment method. Please allow 7-10 business days for the refund to appear on your statement.
Okay, that sounds good. Will I get the full amount back? Because I don't want to be charged any restocking fees or anything like that.

Yes, you will receive a full refund for the purchase price of the VeloBand Pulse. There are no restocking fees for returns made within the 90 days. Just follow the instructions in the email, and you should be all set. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that’s it. I was worried because I thought the return policy was less generous. So I really appreciate you sorting this out so quickly.

You're very welcome! I’m glad I could help. We want you to be completely satisfied with your VeloFit purchase, even if it means processing a return. Is there anything else I can help you with? Perhaps I can show you our range of smart watch products?
No, thanks. I’m done with smart watches for now. Thanks again for your help!
You're very welcome! Have a great day!
